table.title: Place Features
table.subtitle: The properties in this table are used to specify the properties of places.

edit.title: Edit Attribute

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.subtitle: In this form you can edit the basic information of the features.

icon.label: Icon
icon.placeholder: Select an icon from the Box icons theme (e.g. bx bx-home)

activate.title: Feature Activation Status
activate.subtitle: You can activate or deactivate the feature. If you activate the deleted feature, the feature will be visible again.
activate.checkDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate the feature?
activate.checkActivate: Are you sure you want to activate the feature?

delete.title: Delete Feature
delete.subtitle: You can delete the feature in this form.
delete.check: Are you sure you want to delete the feature?

edit.check: Are you sure you want to save the property?

create.title: Create Feature

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.subtitle: In this form you can create the basic information of the feature.

icon.label: Icon
icon.placeholder: Select an icon from the Box icons theme (e.g. bx bx-home)

create.check: Are you sure you want to create a feature?
